If you'd prefer something a bit more unconventional, "Man on Wire" (2008) is an incredible true story about Philippe Petit's daring high-wire walk between the Twin Towers in 1974. You'll be on the edge of your seat as you witness this death-defying stunt and learn about the fascinating man behind it.
